name: 2D Platformer (Xtina49)
description:
This is my 2D Platformer Project.

Modifications:

4 Levels of increasing difficulty. 

Level 1: Basic enemies and simple obstacles.

Level 2: Two types of enemies, obstacles harder.

Level 3: Three types of enemies, obstacles harder. 

Level 4: All enemies included, more pickups, harder obstacles. 

Credits:

Created by Christina Fonseca
